RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 7F Turf CR: 74. Claiming Purse 12400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMERICAN BOUND hustled to the top set the pace widening on the inside in upper stretch holding off a rail running foe at the wire. FIRST IMPRESSION went evenly through the far turn firing in mid stretch angling to the rail coming with a rush arriving a touch late. MOMMY BERTA stalked the pace chasing into upper stretch threatening to the end. BRODY'S JESSICA gained to the far turn angling five wide in upper stretch bidding from mid track late. TOO CROWDED moved evenly through the far turn racing inside down the lane needing more at the end. IRON BERTIE played no factor. TEAM HOT LINE prompted the pace to the far turn weakening into upper stretch. LIKELY CHOICE faded into lane. MY PINK BABY BIRD was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: First Impression
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lagged to lane, fired mid stretch angled rail just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Too Crowded
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, inside to lane, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Team Hot Line
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, weakened to lane

ENTRY.NAME: My Pink Baby Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Mommy Berta
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, loomed to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Likely Choice
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded into lane

ENTRY.NAME: American Bound
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled out, set pace, widened inside lane, held on at wire

ENTRY.NAME: Brody's Jessica
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 5 wide lane, vied late mid track

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 7F Turf CR: 86. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOOPY sent clear moved alert on lead widening in upper stretch holding under pressure along the inside. BELLE BREZING slow early angled out into upper stretch firing six wide gaining quickly in the final yards. AMAAZA tracked the pace rallying on the far turn emerging off a loose leader in upper stretch gaining ground at the end. HELENS WELL (IRE) saved ground to the far turn coming three wide in upper stretch angling back to the rail mid stretch finishing evenly. POLYESTER BRIDE stalked the pace chasing on the far turn weakening into upper stretch. SASSY JUSTICE failed to respond. ACCOLADES GALORE was never involved. SHOW ME THE BEST chased the pace to the far turn then gave way down the lane. TOUT ENSEMBLE was euthanized on track after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Show Me the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Polyester Bride
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Belle Brezing
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, angled out, came on gamely late 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Helens Well (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, 3 wide into lane, angled to rail, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Accolades Galore
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Loopy
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, alert on lead, drew off upper stretch, held on late

ENTRY.NAME: Tout Ensemble
ENTRY.COMMENT: was euthanized on track after the race

ENTRY.NAME: Amaaza
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, emerged top lane, vied willingly late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEXAS DANA pressed the pace wresting the lead on the turn clearing in upper stretch finishing with plenty left. SHEZ FIRED UP rallied to threaten on the turn being rebuffed in upper stretch continuing on a clear second best. NOGRATZ slow early angled four wide in upper stretch finishing evenly. PACKIN slow early was never involved. CAIRO WINNER pressed an early lead ceding on the turn wilting into upper stretch. SENA THE DUCHESS faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Nogratz
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 4 wide to lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Shez Fired Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied on the turn, chased lane, proved second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Cairo Winner
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, ceded on turn, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led on turn, cleared top lane, had more

ENTRY.NAME: Sena the Duchess
ENTRY.OWNER: MM Racing LLC and Laureano Anderson
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Packin
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 30, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'M A COOL MAN sent clear set the pace holding under pressure on the turn then between horses down the lane proving a game customer late. SEMINOLE JUSTICE chased the pace threatening outside on the turn pressing three deep down the lane staying on to the end. UNION BROTHER chased the pace saving ground to upper stretch vying willingly there along the rail. TOMMY TUESDAY raced evenly through the turn then down the stretch lacking punch from mid track. RUM ON THE ROCKS faded on the turn. BOATSWAIN trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Rum On the Rocks
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: I'm a Cool Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, clung to lead turn, dug in between lane, won gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Union Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, saved ground to lane, vied willingly on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Boatswain
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Seminole Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, threatened turn, three deep lane, stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Tommy Tuesday
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked punch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARPIN pressed the pace dueling on the inside through the turn clearing in upper stretch widening under a drive. MISS BUMBUM went evenly through the turn saving ground to upper stretch rallying there along the inside. LT. LYDIA pressed the pace dueling between horses then abreast rival on the turn ceding in upper stretch tiring the final eighth. TEAM FEISTY pressed early three deep then chased on the turn. WOMP was always outrun. LEAPIN LEVA gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Marpin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled inside turn, cleared top lane, widened

ENTRY.NAME: Team Feisty
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed three deep early, chased on turn, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Womp
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Bumbum
ENTRY.COMMENT: went evenly, saved ground to lane, rallied along the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Lt. Lydia
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled between then abreast turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Leapin Leva
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 2F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners At Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 To Carry An Additional 2 lbs. For Each Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PROMINENT HENNY surged clear at mid track. CAN SHE SCOOT came on gamely in the last yards. RED ROCKET GIRL made a clear lead then faltered late. WARRIOR EMPRESS brushed at the break chased all out. TEL AVIV raced evenly needing more. TREASURED NIKKY brushing at the break was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Rocket Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Treasured Nikky
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed break, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Warrior Empress
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed break chased

ENTRY.NAME: Prominent Henny
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged clear mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Tel Aviv
ENTRY.COMMENT: needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Can She Scoot
ENTRY.COMMENT: came on gamely last yards

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 30, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 3 lb s. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASTLE TOY pressed the pace wresting a clear lead on the turn drawing out along the inside the final eighth being ridden out. ULTRA DIVA slow early raced evenly to upper stretch rallying late along the inside splitting horses saving place. AZZURRA hustled along chased through the turn racing three deep down the lane coming up a bit short. VACATION SECRET pressed the pace ceding the lead on the turn chasing from the rail down the lane weakening late. WHISKEY TALKING slow early was no factor. SHEZAGOLDGETTER faded on the turn. SISTER JOANN gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Vacation Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, ceded on turn, chased on rail lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Shezagoldgetter
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Talking
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Castle Toy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, cleared turn, pulled away inside lane ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Ultra Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, evenly to lane, split horses late up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Joann
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Azzurra
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, chased turn, three deep lane, bit short

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 30, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENJOY BASEBALL advanced on the backside dueling three deep down the stretch drifting in impeding rival in mid stretch. PARADE GRAND tracked evenly through the far turn coming four wide in upper stretch responding with a late surge to salvage place. REGAL HOLIDAY pressed the pace dueling between horses to upper stretch being squeezed and forced to check near the sixteenth pole. BIG FALCON ROCKET broke late being rushed to recover chased to upper stretch finishing evenly. PRETTY LOUD slow early was never involved. NOTIMELIKEPRESENT set a pressured pace dueling inside of rivals in upper stretch wearing out late. CAVALLOTTO stalked the pace through the backside then wilted abruptly on the far turn. FOLLOWING AN OBJECTION ENJOY BASEBALL WAS DISQUALIFIED AND PLACED THIRD FOR INTERFERENCE WITH REGAL HOLIDAY DURING THE STRETCH RUN.

ENTRY.NAME: Notimelikepresent
ENTRY.COMMENT: set a pressured pace, dueled inside of foes lane, wore out

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Enjoy Baseball
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, dueled three deep lane, drifted in impeded foe

ENTRY.NAME: Regal Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled between to lane, squeezed checked

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Loud
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Parade Grand
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, 4 wide lane, came on late

ENTRY.NAME: Cavallotto
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, wilted abruptly far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Big Falcon Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke late, hustled along, finished evenly,
